text: Ŵanganyao akwete kupata Matimbe Gandamo, kwasikujilima sulo cha pasi pao, chakapetedwe kwalakweko ni makosa gagolodi, ni chakawaleje nguwo syachisamba sya silika jwakuŵeŵela ni silika jwakandapalila, ali ajegeme kwalakweko nyyindanda yetandiche chenene. Kaje kusalala nnope malipilo (gakwe)! Ni kutama chenene nnope pakwegama ni kupumulila (pakwe)
